description: Defines the TransactionService class, which manages financial transactions such as fund transfers and utility payments within a banking microservice. Contains methods for executing transactions, validating account balances, and interacting with repositories to update account and transaction data.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: Service class handling fund transfers and utility payments, incorporating validation and database persistence.

methods.name: fundTransfer
methods.description: Performs a transfer between two bank accounts after validating fund sufficiency, returns transfer result with transaction ID.

methods.name: utilPayment
methods.description: Processes a utility bill payment from a bank account, updates account balances, and records the transaction.

methods.name: validateBalance
methods.description: Checks if the bank account has sufficient funds for the specified amount; throws exception if not.

methods.name: internalFundTransfer
methods.description: Internal method to execute the balance adjustments and persist transaction records for a fund transfer between accounts.
